title: Wirelessly charge all your new Apple gear with 25% off this super-cool 3-in-1 stand
content:
Macworld

Desk space is scarce, especially if you have a lot of Apple gear. That’s where a good charging station can help and today’s deal is a great one: Anker’s MagSafe 3-in-1 charging station is $25 off at Amazon, ready to fill up your iPhone, Apple Watch, and even your AirPods and keep everything neat. The discount comes in the form of an on-page coupon you have to add, so don’t forget to tap that box.

This wireless charging station isn’t just affordable at $75 and has a sleek design that will save space on your desk or nightstand. The base can provide charging for your earbuds, while the rest of the tree-like design allows for easy placement of your phone and watch. The station has an MFW certification, which means it will deliver optimal charging performance for your Apple Watch.

The station can also charge your iPhone 16 at 15W, thanks to the Qi2 certification and MagSafe compatibility. You won’t even need a wall brick because the station comes with its very own 40W USB-C charger and a 5ft cable.

Basically, you’re all ready to go and juice up all your Apple devices in no time with this Anker charging station for only $75 at Amazon.

Buy it now at Amazon
